message_list.content: Hi! How can I help you today?
I need to change my flight booking.
Great, I can help with that. Could you share your reservation code (PNR) and your last name?
Thanks, Garcia. Would you like me to go ahead and search for available alternative flights now, or do you have specific new dates in mind?
I need to change it to January 16th instead.
Got it—January 16th. Do you have a preferred time of day (morning, afternoon, or evening), and are you flexible by a few hours?
Afternoon, around the same time if possible.
This may take a moment; thanks for your patience. I’m searching afternoon options on January 16 near your current time. I’ll share the best matches shortly.

Thanks for waiting. I found 3 afternoon options on January 16 close to your current flight time:
1) 14:15 — Nonstop — arrives 17:40 — estimated fare difference $62
2) 15:05 — 1 stop — arrives 19:55 — estimated fare difference $0
3) 16:30 — Nonstop — arrives 19:55 — estimated fare difference $118
Which option would you like to switch to?
I'll take the first option, 14:15 nonstop.

Perfect, I’ll proceed with the 14:15 nonstop on January 16. Before I make the change, I’ll confirm the passengers and contact details on file. Could you verify the email address and phone number you’d like on the reservation?

Thanks, I’ve updated your contact to alex.garcia@test.org and +1 5017465659. I’m placing the exchange for the 14:15 nonstop on January 16 now. The estimated fare difference is $62; no other fees apply. Shall I finalize this change?
All set—the change is confirmed. You’re now on January 16, departing 14:15 nonstop and arriving 17:40. Your contact is alex.garcia@test.org and +1 5017465659. Anything else I can help with today?
Thanks for calling! Have a great day. Goodbye.
